title: Linus Ghanadan
text:
Hi, my name is Linus Ghanadan! Welcome to my website! Keep reading to learn more about what I’m up to!
I’m currently pursuing a Master’s degree in Environmental Data Science from the Bren School of Environmental Science & Management at the University of California, Santa Barbara. My career goal is to implement data-driven solutions that advance sustainability within the public and private sectors.
